message: I'm sure that this falls in the "subject to change" category, but I'm done making features for the night, and it got me thinking about what it is I'll call whatever it is I'm making :P.   Could we get a list of "Please Do" and "Please Don't" (unbinding, subject to change, whatever your lawyer says later.... etc)
/cc @ericflo @leah and I don't know the handle of the third cofounder.
don't worry about it too much :D
as long as it is obvious to the most casual user that you made it (and not Convore Inc) then it is probably okay
all you need to do is make it clear that the app is made by you, not Convore Inc
to be safe, don't call it "Convore" :P
I'm sure you can get more creative than that anyway :D
